entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Collingwood
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:59 AM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 4.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Collingwood 11:00 AM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023
Temperature: 4.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.4 kPa rising
Humidity: 59 %
Dewpoint: -2.6°C
Wind: WNW 10 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday: Sunny. High 6.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light early this afternoon. High 6. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy late this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Rain or freezing rain. High 6.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Freezing rain or rain beginning early in the morning then changing to rain late in the morning. Rainfall amount 15 to 25 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h. High 6. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023
